talk_paragraph.talk_question: <html>{ui_string:1200001}</html>
<html>{ui_string:1200002}</html>
<html>{ui_string:1200003}</html>
<html>{ui_string:1200004}</html>
<html>{ui_string:1200005}</html>

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>(Tell her what happened at Arnute Canyon)</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Master Sorceress Stella$
…You don't look too good.
Tell me what happened slowly.

$Master Sorceress Stella$
Daisy is the original form of the clones?
And what jewel… jewel fragment? A clone?
What the heck is this all about...

$Master Sorceress Stella$
(Stella sighs quietly)
More and more puzzles to solve… What on earth happened in the future? It's beyond my capacity to catch up.

$Master Sorceress Stella$
Well, anyway… If it's the ancient temple near Arnute Canyon, it must be where the Hero Barnac's grave is. Who would have known they were at a place like that? No wonder we couldn't find them even when we searched the entire desert!

$Master Sorceress Stella$
Hmm, I get angrier when I think about it.
Go and investigate the Ancient Temple with Comelina.
If we're certain that Jasmine is there, we'll send you support.

${user_nick}$
(She looks pale. Seems like she didn't rest at all since you saw her for the last time)

$Master Sorceress Stella$
What a nerve to use that place as a base.
Since it's occupied by them now, maybe it should be called the Occupied Ancient Temple...
Be careful.

${user_nick}$
(She looks pale. Seems like she didn't rest since you saw her for the last time)

$Academic Comelina$
Oh no…

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>Is there anything you can do with the jewel alone? Like becoming a dragon or...</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Academic Comelina$
Jasmine was eyeing Daisy's jewel right from the start…!
If Daisy is our original model, she must have the whole jewel since me and my sisters weren't born yet at the present time. So she must have tremendous power... but I don't understand why Jasmine is here only now…

$Academic Comelina$
(Shakes her head)There are too many uncertainties. There are no proven cases either... Even if she takes the jewel now, she can only make clones like us… Oh!

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>(Seems like it would be better to change the topic) Er… Comelina?</html>
<html>Wait a minute, I have something to ask you.</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Academic Comelina$
That seems to be the case. And since she has tried making us already, she would be able to create more powerful clones. How many more sisters are going to be created and be killed...(Comelina looks at the direction Jasmine went to with a sad face)

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>…I understand that Daisy is a jewel but… how is she a dragon's jewel?</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Academic Comelina$
…Hmm? Oh, what is it?

$Academic Comelina$
…I don't know. But it seems like there's a need for investigation.
If it is a dragon that has been recorded in books, we can find out about its weaknesses.
Leave the investigation to me. I can use the technology from the future to do a good job!

$Academic Comelina$
I'll search this place first.
Since this place was chosen to extract the jewel, there must be some records about the jewel here.
{user_nick}, don't worry about me!
(Comelina seems determined. Go back to Saint Haven and report to Master Sorceress Stella)

$Master Sorceress Stella$
I waited forever. So what happened?

$Master Sorceress Stella$
Whaaaaaaat!?!??!?!
Jasmine took the jewel from Daisy?
A shining dragon's jewel??!!

$Master Sorceress Stella$
My head is aching now... Tell me a story that I can follow.
Yeah I understand that she can make a few more clones.
But the puzzle gets more complicated if she does that...

$Master Sorceress Stella$
Think about it...
Jasmine knows that Daisy is the original model for the clones...
and Jasmine made the clones with her own hands or at least participated in the creation.
This is a fact since Comelina mentioned something about it too.

$Master Sorceress Stella$
But what made her certain that Daisy would appear at Tel Rosa City? Usually a little girl wouldn't go to a burning city, yeah? And it can't be that someone as cautious as Jasmine went there based on luck.

$Master Sorceress Stella$
And there's more. Why did Daisy have the jewel but not turn into a dragon?Jewels are dangerous. A weak person would have their body and heart swallowed by the jewel's powers. And moreover, Daisy is a little girl. You know that it's impossible.

$Master Sorceress Stella$
More puzzles but no way to solve them. I'm so frustrated.
I hope Comelina has some progress on the investigation.
Oh, have you seen where Jasmine went to?

$Master Sorceress Stella$
She must be up to something bigger... I get headaches thinking about it but we should at least be relieved that she has paused for a while.
<html>$Quest Reward$</html>

$Master Sorceress Stella$
Don't leave everything to Comelina. Why don't you go and look around too?
You might find something.

* [Extra Chapter 2. Code Name Zero] Part 1 completed.

journal.title: A Smiling Promise 1
journal.contents:
Tell Master Sorceress Stella what happened at Arnute Canyon.

Saint Haven - Master Sorceress Stella

journal.title: A Smiling Promise 2
journal.contents:
Jasmine is at Occupied Ancient Temple.
Look for Jasmine at Occupied Ancient Temple.

Riverwort Wharf (Tel Rosa Gates) - Occupied Temple Ruins
journal.todo_msg: Find Jasmine at Occupied Ancient Temple.

journal.title: A Smiling Promise 3
journal.contents:
Too late.
Jasmine plucked the jewel from Daisy and ran away.
Ask Academic Comelina about this situation.

Occupied Ancient Temple - Academic Comelina

journal.title: A Smiling Promise 4
journal.contents:
Academic Comelina made a deduction that Jasmine took the jewel to make new clones. However, it is unknown what dragon Daisy was, and she promised to investigate on it. Report to Master Sorceress Stella.

Saint Haven - Master Sorceress Stella
journal.todo_msg: Go back to Saint Haven and report to Master Sorceress Stella.

journal.title: [Extra Chapter 2. Code Name Zero] Part 1 Completed
journal.contents: <html>* <FONT color=#7e12d2>[Extra Chapter 2. Code Name Zero] Part 1 had been completed.</FONT></html>
journal.todo_msg: [Extra Chapter 2. Code Name Zero] Part 1 has been completed.
